artist: Painter: Seipse; Engraver: Peter Thomson; Publisher: John Major
description: portrait bust of man with long curly hair, facing right, gesturing with left hand
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription

on sheet below image in black: [Seipse, pinx.  P. Thomson sc./DIEPENBECK/LONDON/Published by John Major, 50 Fleet Street/ Sept\'r 15th, 1826]; on sheet in pencil: [1-348]; on verso in pencil lower right: [2/]
title: Portrait of Diepenbeck
